scripts.dev: npm run test && npx env-cmd -f .env.dev ts-node-dev --respawn src/app.ts
scripts.runLocalDocker: npm run createDockerImage && docker container run --rm -p 8080:8080 --init --name bookutilapi bookutilapi
scripts.devBatch: npm run test && npm run build && xcopy src\batch\dbdata\ dist\batch\dbdata\ /s /y /h && npx env-cmd -f .env.dev node dist/batch/sandbox.js
scripts.prodBatch: npm run test && npm run build && xcopy src\batch\dbdata\ dist\batch\dbdata\ /s /y /h && npx env-cmd -f .env.prod node dist/batch/hoge.js
scripts.createDockerImage: npm run test && docker build --file=Dockerfile_api -t bookutilapi .
scripts.createDockerImageCheckLibrary: npm run test && docker build --file=Dockerfile_checkLibrary -t bookutilchecklibrary .
scripts.setTagToDockerImage: docker tag bookutilapi asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:v1 && docker tag bookutilapi asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:latest
scripts.setTagToDockerImageCheckLibrary: docker tag bookutilchecklibrary asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilchecklibrary:v1 && docker tag bookutilchecklibrary asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilchecklibrary:latest
